title: Fatal Shooting By Toddler Brings Attention To Concealed Weapons
teaser: A Blackfoot, Idaho, mother was fatally shot Tuesday by her two-year-old son. Robert Siegel talks to Blackfoot mayor Paul Loomis about the community's response and gun culture in the state.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
